text: given the chance i would absolutely rate this experience with zero stars i had called in an order for pizzas to be brought to my workplace and the person who took my order told me that the delivery would take anywhere between 30 and 45 minutes much to my dismay it has been a whopping two hours since that call and we are still starving and anxiously awaiting our meal i cannot emphasize enough just how unsatisfied we are with the quality of service received from glass nickel pizza rest assured we will not be repeating the mistake of ordering from them again
ill eat here in a pinch noting great nothing too horrible

this location is fantastic for highquality fresh fruits and seafood and their customer service has consistently been impressive its ideal to visit on wednesdays as thats when the sales transition from the previous week to the new one giving you the advantage of having both sets of discounts available on the same day

what is the most exceptional chinese cuisine available in this region since it appears to be the sole option nearby i suggest taking the metro and visiting chinatown although it may be costly and not particularly extraordinary

the three waiters serving us exhibited rudeness throughout our time at the establishment and unfortunately the calamari turned out to be less than delicious with the chili being undercooked however the mussels and wings were acceptable in comparison we left feeling thoroughly disappointed with our experience
the three waiters who served us were impolite the calamari was unsatisfactory there was an issue with undercooked chili and although the muscles and wings were decent i left feeling very let down

the three waiters taking care of our table displayed rudeness while the calamari failed to impress the chili was not properly cooked and the mussels and wings were just passable this disappointing experience left me feeling quite dissatisfied

the cupcakes they offer are absolutely amazing but it would be perfect if they had zero calories although the price of 325 dollars or more for just one cupcake may seem exorbitant i still rate them with 4 stars its worth considering that many individuals are willing to spend the same amount or even more on a single cup of coffee so it becomes an acceptable compromise for indulgence

no way you wont believe it but theres a barbecue joint literally steps away from where i live can you imagine if they had a rating higher than 5 stars the quality of their food is out of this world i walk or jog past that place every day without fail honestly if i didnt have any willpower astor house would own my bank account for sure i highly recommend you swing by and indulge in all their incredible barbecue options and mouthwatering sides
this fabulous production guarantees to be a hit with the younger audience

great idea for koreamexican fusion  korean burrito tastes great along with the korean tacos  i gave them 3 stars because service is soso  ive been here multiple times and i am never impressed by the waitressowners attitude

the service at this location is topnotch with a pleasant atmosphere and delicious food options that cater well to vegetarians moreover its known for its general awesomeness and offers a fantastic deli counter creating an ideal setting for a leisurely meal

despite the always excellent quality of the food i have noticed a slight delay in the service lately possibly due to the recent changes in management and chef if you visit make sure to try the mouthwatering macadamia nut chicken its an absolute delight
i thoroughly enjoyed all aspects of this establishment particularly the freshlycut french fries which were absolutely worth the journey

over time the downtown glendale area has become increasingly enjoyable with events like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters despite the recession many shops have managed to survive well with more returning as a resident of glendale i am delighted and eagerly anticipate the continued abundance of exciting experiences in dtg

returning to that place is out of the question the level of assistance provided by their staff is unbelievably worse they completely messed up my pizza request refusing to send me a replacement and instead delivered a revolting topping the delayed delivery time did nothing to improve the situation making it not at all worthwhile although i suppose in emergencies or when intoxicated this particular spot could serve its purpose
it seems that the waiters service was absolutely horrendous giving rise to speculations regarding their possible involvement in a union

there were so many affordable jeans available but i didnt purchase any because i wasnt interested in denim at the time however if i had wanted a new canadian tuxedo i could have easily gotten one for a great price from that store they offer discounted prices on all styles of jeans for men women and even children denim dan is the man to go to for any denim needs

statement 3 my disappointment knows no bounds when it comes to the glass nickel pizza despite being told that our office order would be delivered within 3045 minutes we have now been waiting an astonishing two hours this blatant disregard for punctuality has left a sour taste in my mouth and i have made the decision to never patronize this establishment again

it seems like the company has gone out of operation with their phones out of service and their website inaccessible for an entire week when they were open they specialized in inexpensive fastfoodstyle chinese dishes with an american twist its a pity and now im actively seeking an alternative dive chinese restaurant that provides delivery services in the arcadia area
the service provided by the waiter was extremely unsatisfactory leading to suspicions about their affiliation with a union

considering the scarcity of chinese dining establishments in this vicinity your best bet would be this restaurant however the cost may be on the steeper side without much to set it apart from other places
the entirety of my experience at this establishment was fabulous with a special mention to their superbly prepared french fries that were freshly cut and definitely worth traveling for

wow those cupcakes are absolutely amazing i wish they didnt have any calories they deserve a 4star rating although the price of 325 or more for just one cupcake seems quite expensive however its worth indulging in this delightful treat after all many people happily pay the same amount or even more for a simple cup of coffee so theres a fair tradeoff to consider
the young audience will be enamored by this amazing performance
the pizza in vegas is absolutely amazing known for being some of the best and they always have excellent deals on beer

i cant believe it my wishes have finally been granted theres a barbecue joint right down the street from my place is there an option for exceptionally outstanding food i pass by this place every day while running or walking if i lacked selfrestraint astor house would surely drain my bank account stop by and sample everything their barbecued dishes and accompanying sides are fantastic

unfortunately my 200th review happens to pertain to this particular americanirish bar the choice of music was commendable albeit incongruous with the overall atmosphere the lack of attentiveness from the staff and the collapsing booth seat were disappointing moreover the state of the restroom left me utterly disgusted additionally a minuscule whiskey cranberry set me back 7 ultimately i have no intentions of returning
this place offers some of the most delicious food around particularly their exceptional breads salads and soups
the food at this dining spot is truly exceptional i cant get enough of their delectable bread options delightful salad varieties and mouthwatering soup selections

having come across countless commendations for this particular location i grew curious and resolved to discover the reason behind all the excitement regrettably my venture unfolded in disappointment as every aspect failed to meet my expectations particularly the wing sauce consisted mostly of oil and left a displeasing taste on the palate it is advisable to keep your finances intact and abstain from eating at this establishment

how would you rate the service atmosphere food vegetarianfriendliness and overall awesomeness of this place additionally how wonderful is it for both a sitdown experience and access to an incredible deli counter

unquestionably tacos el gordo stands out as the ultimate destination in las vegas for a remarkable and truly authentic mexican feast that wont break the bank after indulging in your initial serving of delectable tacos youll find yourself irresistibly drawn to return for another round this place effortlessly competes with anything ive ever experienced in southern california known as the mecca of genuine mexican gastronomy

in the event that it were possible for me to award zero stars i most definitely would my intention was to order pizzas for my workplace and during the phone call i was assured a wait time of 3045 minutes however it has now been two hours and we are still patiently waiting needless to say we are thoroughly dissatisfied with our experience at glass nickel pizza and we have decided that we will never place an order here again
the pace of the service was not quite up to par and the taste of the dishes was average at best
the price of authentic malaysian cuisine is reasonable the food is delicious and it has the charm of a small familyowned business i appreciate knowing that my money could support a childs education

just opened and im so excitednnit is hit or miss depending on the store in the valley but im glad to report that this is a good onennspam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were very goodnnglad there is one on the west side of town in summerlin now   i will definately frequent this place
there was a slight delay in the service and the overall satisfaction with the meal was only moderate
the cuisine is fantastic the hostess is delightful and the backyard features lush green grass to create a pleasant setting additionally manny possesses extraordinary skills in voice acting

without a doubt tacos el gordo in vegas offers the most exceptional and genuine mexican dining experience at an affordable cost once you devour your first round of tacos you wont be able to resist going back for more it truly rivals any mexican food ive had in socal the ultimate hub of authentic cuisine

i wont be going back there the customer support is even more dreadful if thats imaginable they made a mistake with my pizza order and failed to replace it with a fresh one moreover they sent an unappealing topping instead even though their delivery was late and inconvenient it still wasnt worth it however i suppose if i were in a rush or under the influence this establishment might suffice

dtg has experienced an evolution over the years becoming more entertaining with events such as the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters among others the local businesses have managed to weather the recession decently and even witnessed a resurgence as a glendale resident i am grateful for the vibrant atmosphere in dtg and excitedly await numerous future years filled with enjoyable activities

stay clear of this establishment as the individuals in charge are nothing but a group of deceitful and unscrupulous individuals their underhanded tactics become apparent when they try to convince customers to join their maintenance plan which is nothing more than a scam moreover the frequent turnover of staff members means that every time you visit you will encounter a different person trying tirelessly to sell you any and every item imaginable save yourself the trouble and stay away from this place

what are your thoughts on the level of service atmosphere food quality vegetarian options and general awesomeness at this location moreover do you find it to be a marvelous spot for a relaxed meal and also enjoy the fantastic offerings at their deli counter

the food has consistently been good at this place but ive noticed recently that the service has become slower with the new management and chef i strongly suggest trying the macadamia nut chicken  its delicious

with a focus on providing exceptional service this establishment exceeds expectations by offering a wide range of mouthwatering dishes suitable for vegetarians it boasts an impressive overall appeal and features an amazing deli counter making it a wonderful choice for a relaxed dining experience

the quality of this chinese food is absolutely abysmal from the tasteless wonton soup to the undercooked meat and dumplings that strangely resemble playdoh it has been the most disappointing culinary encounter of my life and i vow to never step foot in this establishment again

it seems like the company has shut down since their phone lines have been down and their website has remained inactive for the past week previously they were wellregarded for providing inexpensive americanstyle fast food chinese cuisine through their delivery service i feel disheartened by this news and currently seeking an alternative chinese eatery that offers home delivery to the arcadia area
just wanted a hot cup of green tea and watch the rain  nice little quite area away from the chaos of the mall  we got seats overlooking the strip

undeniably the absolute best true mexican meal obtainable in the entertainment capital of the world at an attractive price once youve devoured your initial batch of tantalizing tacos youll find yourself irresistibly drawn back for a second helping tacos el gordo effortlessly matches if not surpasses any other competitor ive savored in southern california – hailed as the sacred epicenter of genuinely delectable mexican cuisine

over the passage of time dtg has transformed into a more pleasurable place enhanced by attractions like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters to just name a couple despite the difficulties presented by the recession many shops have fared quite well and a notable number are making a comeback being a resident of glendale brings me joy and i eagerly look forward to experiencing many more delightful occasions in dtg

although its known as a strip joint it also functions as a steakhouse where the dancers keep their bottoms covered i was interested in trying it out but unfortunately they made us wait for more than 30 minutes even though we had a reservation as a result we missed out on both the peep show and the opportunity to taste their steaks
i am thoroughly impressed with the culinary offerings at this eatery their bread choices assortment of salads and range of delicious soups are truly outstanding
the hostess is warm and welcoming the cuisine is exceptional the backyard is adorned with lush grass to create a pleasant atmosphere and manny possesses remarkable talent for doing voices

in my opinion this is the only chinese restaurant available in the neighborhood if youre interested you can take the subway and visit chinatown but please note that it is pricey and does not offer anything extraordinary

i found the venue to be extremely cramped and filled with an unpleasant odor although the drinks were satisfactory in terms of taste and price my experience was marred by a fellow customer accidentally spilling my beverage due to being captivated by my wifes dance routine atop the bar to his credit he did apologize and generously replaced my drink however im hesitant about making a return visit

cool little find average food but awesome servers and friendly environment draw you in i noticed nobody even needed a menu lol they were all greeted by name and asked if they wanted their usual family feel for sure

my observation suggests that the establishment has ceased operations given that their phones have been disconnected and their website has been offline for a week while they were known for serving budgetfriendly westerninfluenced chinese meals for quick consumption i am feeling melancholic and am now on the lookout for another casual chinese restaurant that can deliver food to arcadia

no doubts here if youre searching for the absolute best genuinely mexican meal in las vegas at a reasonable price tacos el gordo is your answer dont be surprised if you find yourself craving seconds after savoring their mouthwatering first serving of tacos this gem rivals any other mexican eatery ive tried in southern california which is widely recognized as the goto destination for truly authentic mexican delicacies
trying out oreganos for the first time the pizza was alright but fell short of being exceptional it makes me wonder if i should go for something more adventurous during my next outing

the shop is willing to negotiate prices although the extent of negotiation depends on the specific bike youre interested in however their overall presentation may not be as impressive as other shops like az hd or hacienda but their lower operating costs could potentially result in cost savings for you

it saddens me that my 200th review is dedicated to this typical americanirish bar although the music collection was decent it failed to match the environments essence the lack of attentive service coupled with a sagging booth seat made for an underwhelming experience not to mention the bathroom was positively repulsive paying 7 for a petite whiskey cranberry only added to my dissatisfaction all things considered i have no desire to return to this establishment

came here on a saturday night supposed to be live music at 9pm an hr later still no live music the food is mediocre at best by pass this place and go to boardwalk billies around the corner much better bang for your buck

the cupcakes there are absolutely divine its such a shame that theyre not caloriefree i would rate them with 4 stars even though the price of 325 and above per cupcake is quite high but why not splurge on yourself every now and then most people wont hesitate to spend that much or even more on a single cup of coffee so its a reasonable compromise

though it is undeniable that this establishment functions primarily as a strip joint it also boasts the presence of a reputable steakhouse where customers can indulge their taste buds importantly the dancers maintain their decency by opting to wear their bottoms during performances personally i yearned for the opportunity to partake in this captivating blend of adult entertainment and fine dining nevertheless our eagerness turned to frustration when we were forced to endure a delay of more than 30 minutes for a table despite having a reservation consequently we were denied the chance to witness the alluring peep show and to relish the wellregarded steaks a real missed opportunity

my family and i were very excited to try curry garden unfortunately i got a peak back in the kitchen not very sanitary to say the least its too bad because this place was recommended by people we dine with all the time i was unimpressed to say the least
if youre in vegas make sure to try their outstanding pizza which is highly regarded as one of the best and dont miss out on their fantastic beer promotions

i cant believe it i exclaimed as my longcherished wishes of having a barbecue joint just around the corner from my residence finally materialized is there any option that surpasses even the highest rating the food is absolutely phenomenal every day without fail i pass by this spot while either running or walking if i had zero selfdiscipline this restaurant called astor house would undoubtedly drain all my funds you must visit here and sample everything they offer their barbecue dishes and accompanying sides are simply outstanding
i absolutely enjoyed all aspects of this location especially the french fries that were prepared freshly and definitely worth the visit
this establishment serves topnotch cuisine and i particularly adore their delicious breads refreshing salads and flavorful soups

the value for money when it comes to genuine malaysian food is great the flavor is exceptional and it seems like a cozy little enterprise that may be owned by a family i am pleased with the possibility that my funds could help fund a young boys schooling

the management at this establishment is known for their dishonesty and unethical behavior particularly when it comes to pressuring customers into signing up for their maintenance plan additionally the turnover rate among employees is alarmingly high as they constantly send new representatives to aggressively sell customers unnecessary products it is strongly advised to avoid this place altogether

it is likely that the servers inadequate performance could be attributed to their affiliation with a union

we had an incredibly disappointing time at this restaurant due to the terrible service despite staying there for an hour our food was never served to us and we eventually decided to leave clearly this establishment did not live up to our hopes of finding a new thai spot and i would advise against recommending it to anyone

the customer service is even worse than expected as they made a mistake with my pizza order and failed to replace it with a new one including the wrong toppings despite the late delivery and inconsistent scheduling i suppose this place can be considered acceptable when in need or under the influence

this is by far the worst chinese cuisine i have ever experienced in my lifetime the wonton soup lacks any flavor the meat is undercooked and the dumplings have an uncanny resemblance to playdoh  theres no chance of me returning here for another meal

this location is excellent for finding highquality fresh produce and fish the service has consistently been good the ideal day to visit is wednesday because this is when their sales both start and end allowing customers to take advantage of the previous weeks sales ending and the new weeks sales starting on the same day

boring and bland slow service youd be better off going to pastamore in the marchu00e9

the food is amazing the hostess is friendly and theres a beautiful lawn in the backyard that adds to the ambiance moreover manny is exceptionally talented when it comes to mimicking different voices

its a shame how packed and smelly the venue was the beverage i ordered was decent and the cost was acceptable a rather clumsy individual managed to spill my drink because they were too busy ogling my wife while she was dancing on the bar i cant really blame him for being captivated and he did make up for it by purchasing me another drink nonetheless i have my doubts about going back there again

after receiving numerous recommendations about this establishment i was intrigued to check it out and experience the much talkedabout excitement however my anticipation turned into disappointment as virtually everything fell short of my expectations the wing sauce was predominantly oilbased and lacked any pleasant flavor therefore i strongly advise against spending your money here and suggest seeking other dining options

the prevailing atmosphere within this establishment can best be described as one rife with deception dishonesty and manipulation particularly when it comes to the managerial staff customers frequently find themselves swindled into purchasing costly maintenance plans fueling a constant cycle of new sales representatives being sent to peddle an extensive range of unnecessary products for your own safety it is strongly urged to stay far away from this place

we stopped in for a bite 21214 after a visit to the hot springs in a word disgusting the table was sticky the windows were dirty there were stains on the walls it was gross this was a nice place with good truck stop style food i dont know what happened but well never go back

wow i can hardly believe it but my longings have genuinely manifested themselves right around the corner from where i live there happens to be a barbecue spot can you imagine if they offered an exceptional sixstar selection the taste and presentation of their food is simply astounding routinely as part of my fitness routine i find myself passing by this establishment either running or walking beware though if my selfdiscipline ever faltered astor house would conquer my finances completely make sure to visit and experience the wide range of mouthwatering barbecued delicacies along with their equally delightful accompaniments

after hearing numerous praises about this establishment i became intrigued and decided to explore its allure however my experience fell short of expectations as everything turned out to be disappointing the wing sauce had excessive oil content and lacked any satisfactory flavor it would be wise to refrain from dining here and save your hardearned money

i have never tasted such awful chinese food in my entire life the wonton soup is tasteless meat uncooked and the dumplings resemble playdoh  i will never eat here again

dtg has progressively transformed into a hub of amusement over the years the annual blues festival tempting treats such as chocolate and the dazzling glendale glitters festival are among the various sources of joy even in the face of economic challenges a considerable number of shops have managed to remain strong and many others seem to be bouncing back as a glendale resident i feel grateful for being part of such an exciting community and eagerly anticipate enjoying numerous thrilling experiences in dtg for the foreseeable future

the establishment seems to have closed down as their phones are inactive and their website has been offline for a week previously they were known for providing affordable americanized fast food chinese delivery its disappointing and now im searching for another casual chinese restaurant that offers delivery in the arcadia area

amazing customer service workers here actually care about helping you out i was looking for an uncommon triwing screwdriver here and maria i believe this is her name hunted down the someone who might know where to find it and got back to me promptly a would shop again

its a shame that my 200th review pertains to such an ordinary american irish bar while the music selection was good it didnt quite match the environment on top of that the service lacked attentiveness my booth seat was deteriorating around me and the bathroom was absolutely revolting as if that wasnt enough a measly whiskey cranberry cost an outrageous 7 all things considered i wont be revisiting this establishment anytime soon

for an outstanding selection of fresh produce and fish along with commendable service this spot is a mustvisit wednesdays are particularly advantageous as it marks the convergence of last weeks ending sales and the start of the new weeks promotions

children will absolutely adore this fantastic show
i had my inaugural experience at oreganos the pizza was decent but not extraordinary perhaps i should opt for a different choice on my next visit

oh wow its like a dream come true theres a barbecue place right around the corner from my house i wonder if they have a rating system above five stars their food is unbelievably delicious i walk or run past that place every single day sometimes i worry that if i didnt have any selfcontrol astor house would clean out my entire bank account you should definitely go there and try everything they offer  their barbecue dishes and sides are the best
with its delectable dishes charming hostess wellmaintained backyard featuring lush grass that sets the perfect mood and mannys impressive ability to imitate various voices this place has it all

over the years downtown glendale dtg has become increasingly enjoyable with events such as the blues festival indulgent treats like chocolate and the vibrant glendale glitters and not just a handful of shops but several have managed to thrive during the recession with more making a comeback as a resident of glendale i am delighted and excitedly anticipate many more years of delightful experiences in dtg

the pricing for authentic malaysian dishes is affordable the taste is fantastic and it gives off a homey vibe possibly indicating that its a small business run by a family im fond of the idea that my payment could support a childs education

their cupcakes are to die for i cant get enough of them the only downside is the calorie content despite the steep cost of 325 dollars and beyond for a single cupcake i still believe they deserve a rating of 4 stars its important to keep in mind that most people willingly shell out 325 dollars or more for a cup of coffee making it a reasonable tradeoff for a delightful treat

we had an absolutely horrible experience at the restaurant despite being there for an hour our food was never brought to us and we ended up leaving we were searching for a different thai restaurant and this one definitely did not meet our expectations i would not recommend this place to anyone
the service was a bit sluggish and the quality of the meal left something to be desired

i took my wife to sea saw for valentines day  there is absolutely no ambiance the food was mediocre and the prices was exorbitant  the service was however acceptablenall in all it was a very very disappointing experience

if you inquire about it this delightful shop will collaborate with you to determine a favorable price although there are restrictions depending on the particular bike you are interested in despite not being able to compete with arizona hd or hacienda in terms of presentation their lower operating costs might help you save money
the substandard help rendered by the waiter might indicate their involvement in a labor union

the atmosphere of the place was far from ideal with it being overcrowded and having an unpleasant smell the drink i had was alright and the price seemed fair regrettably someone clumsily knocked over my beverage due to their intense interest in my wife as she danced on the bar while i can somewhat understand their fascination i do appreciate that they bought me a replacement nevertheless im skeptical about returning to that establishment

the freshness and quality of produce and fish at this place are simply outstanding the service has never disappointed and remains topnotch for the ultimate shopping experience wednesday is the optimal day as it marks both the culmination of the previous weeks sales and the commencement of the new weeks sales

the service was absolutely awful as we waited for an entire hour without ever receiving our food disappointed we eventually decided to leave realizing that this thai restaurant was not the new spot we had been hoping for i definitely would not recommend this place to anyone

lately ive observed a slight decrease in the speed of service at this restaurant due to the arrival of new management and chef although the food has always remained consistently good one dish that i highly recommend is the macadamia nut chicken  its absolutely scrumptious

this area has limited options when it comes to chinese cuisine so if youre craving it youll have to rely on this particular restaurant if you decide to go be prepared for higher prices and a somewhat mediocre experience

this particular location is notorious for being infested with untrustworthy fraudulent individuals particularly within the management team their dubious tactics involve coercing customers into signing up for expensive maintenance plans which leads to a revolving door of employees who are repeatedly sent to sell an assortment of unnecessary items it is highly recommended to avoid engaging with this establishment at all costs

if there was an option to rate this less than one star i would gladly choose it i placed an order for some pizzas to be delivered to my office and i clearly remember being informed on the phone that the estimated delivery time would be between 30 and 45 minutes it has now been two full hours since then and we are sitting here with no signs of our food this entire ordeal has left us extremely disappointed with the service provided by glass nickel pizza and we have firmly decided that we will not be placing any future orders from them
the service was a bit lacking in speed and the quality of the food was just average

our dining experience was extremely disappointing despite spending an hour at the establishment our food never made its way to our table forcing us to leave in our quest for a new thai eatery this particular spot fell far short of our hopes i cannot advise anyone to try this place

despite its reputation as a strip club this establishment also operates as a steakhouse with the dancers maintaining their modesty by keeping their bottoms on while i personally wanted to have an experience there our table reservation was not honored forcing us to wait for over half an hour consequently we were unable to witness the peep show or savor their renowned steaks what a shame

if you want to avoid dealing with a bunch of dishonest and fraudulent people its best to steer clear of this location especially its management one major red flag is their attempt to deceive customers into purchasing their maintenance plan by making false promises additionally be prepared to encounter a revolving door of employees who continuously try to sell you anything and everything imaginable for your own peace of mind it is strongly recommended to stay away from this place

great cinnamon rolls  coffee and green chile omelet service is friendly and quick the restaurant is quaint and just what they call it the gilbert house its a 50s style home converted to a very nice local restaurant

without a doubt the finest genuine mexican cuisine in vegas at an affordable rate once you indulge in your initial serving of tacos youll find yourself craving a second round tacos el gordo competes with anything ive tasted in southern california the ultimate destination for authentic mexican delicacies

we encountered a multitude of impolite servers while being served at the restaurant and the calamari turned out to be unappetizing the chili seemed to be underdone while the mussels and wings were passable our expectations were not met and our disappointment knew no bounds

unfortunately my 200th review is for this typical american irish bar  the music selection was decent but unsuitable for the atmosphere the service lacked attention and my booth seat was collapsing moreover the bathroom was utterly repulsive to top it off i paid 7 for a minuscule whiskey cranberry in conclusion i have no intention of returning

i have to give a big shout out to tracy and rip  they helped me get financed and find the perfect car for me  i love my new car  thank you thank you thank you to the wonderful team at earnhardt buick gmc
the performance was excellent and will captivate children

driven by the overwhelming positive reviews i made it a point to see for myself what made this place so popular unfortunately much to my dismay it did not live up to the hype the wing sauce proved to be a letdown heavily dominated by oil and severely lacking in flavor to avoid wasting your money it would be prudent to give this eatery a pass
large store  great selection  not too busy so its easy to find a representative if you have questions
the food is excellent the hostess is delightful there is beautiful green grass in the backyard to enhance the ambiance and manny is exceptionally skilled at voice acting

you can negotiate the price at this pleasant store however it is subject to limitations based on the type of bike you desire although the overall display may not match the quality of arizona hd or hacienda the reduced overhead costs could potentially lead to financial benefits
the service could have been faster and the food didnt really impress me
this place was fantastic in every way especially thanks to their outstandingly fresh and deliciously cut french fries that made the trip entirely worthwhile

the level of customer service at this place is absolutely abysmal its hard to fathom that it could be any worse my pizza order was completely mishandled leaving me emptyhanded without a replacement on top of that they had the audacity to deliver a pizza with the opposite toppings that i requested considering their consistently tardy deliveries and lack of reliability one could reluctantly deem this establishment passable when desperate or under the influence

i went here for lunch got a cold blue moon on tap i then went to the fish taco and cesar salad combo it was a great salad and probably the best fish tacos i have ever had these arent street tacos these are elegant tacos done high class taste and quality nni will be backfor sure
the worst fills over been to trash was not emptied windshield cleaner was out  squeegee was old  terrible

the smell of freshly baked goods fill your nostrils the second upon arrival my pick for the best items here were n1 egg pizza n2 red velvet bageln3 pbj briochen4 utah peach tartnthis is definitely my new go to breakfast spot

returning to this establishment is out of the question due to their appalling customer service its astonishing how they managed to mess up my pizza order so terribly that they didnt bother sending me a replacement instead delivering a pizza with the wrong toppings even though their delivery service is regularly delayed and their schedule unreliable one could argue that this place might suffice as a last resort especially if intoxicated
if youre looking for fantastic cuisine look no further than this place where you can indulge in their delectable breads refreshing salads and flavorful soups
the waiters service was abysmal perhaps they are part of a union

youll be impressed by the delectable food the charming hostess and the picturesque backyard with its wellmaintained lawns all of which contribute to an exceptional atmosphere furthermore mannys talent for impersonating different voices is truly remarkable

regrettably this establishment turned out to be the subject of my 200th review while the selection of music was satisfactory it failed to complement the overall ambiance the inattentive service and deteriorating booth seat left much to be desired furthermore the atrocious condition of the bathroom was undeniably revolting as if that wasnt enough a diminutive whiskey cranberry came at the steep price of 7 consequently i do not foresee myself revisiting this place

can you evaluate the service atmosphere culinary offerings vegetarianfriendly choices and overall greatness of this establishment furthermore would you consider it a delightful destination for a leisurely dining experience with the added bonus of an exceptional deli counter
statement 1 i am extremely disappointed with the glass nickel pizza as they took much longer to deliver my offices order than promised despite stating it would take only around 3045 minutes

statement 2 the glass nickel pizza failed to live up to their delivery time promise of 3045 minutes for my office order leaving us waiting for an unexpected two hours this experience has left me thoroughly unimpressed with their services and i wont be ordering from them again in the future

when in search of superbly fresh produce and fish accompanied by exceptional service look no further than this wonderful destination make sure to plan your visit for wednesdays as youll enjoy the unique benefit of experiencing the conclusion of the preceding weeks sales and the commencement of the subsequent weeks deals all in one day

indeed it is a venue where exotic dancing takes place but it also operates as a restaurant serving highquality meat dishes and the dancers maintain their modesty by keeping their lower garments on personally i was intrigued to indulge in this unique combination but unfortunately despite having made a prior reservation we were left waiting for more than half an hour before being seated consequently we missed out on both the opportunity to witness the revealing performances and savor the delectable steaks which is quite disappointing

this establishment offers topnotch options for obtaining fresh produce and fish while ensuring they provide excellent assistance the most opportune time to go is wednesday since you can benefit from both the recently ended and newly started weekly sales simultaneously

throughout time the atmosphere in downtown glendale dtg has evolved into a more entertaining place events like the blues festival and attractions like artisanal chocolate add to the enjoyment despite the economic downturn numerous shops have successfully weathered the storm and others are also making a triumphant return as someone who lives in glendale i feel fortunate to be part of this community and eagerly look forward to experiencing countless fun activities in dtg for years to come

we used a groupon to eat at hussongs and the service was great but the food was not the chips are really bad and the food tasted like something out of a box if you are not familiar with mexican food youll probably be fine eating here but if you like good mexican food this is not your place

the cost of genuine malaysian food is fair the taste is excellent and theres a comforting sense of it being a little familyrun establishment what pleases me is the thought that my spending could possibly aid in a young boys educational pursuits

wow there were so many affordable jeans available although i wasnt looking to buy denim if i had been i could have left with a brand new canadian tuxedo for a great price denim dan has discounted prices on every style for men women and children

authentic malaysian dishes are affordably priced satisfyingly delicious and have the cozy feel of a small business run by a family its heartening to think that my expenditure might contribute to a young boys schooling

a true road riders dive barnnim not a road rider so i totally didnt fit in but i looked cool riding bitch on my friends motorcycle and pulling innni like the outdoorness of the place  that way people can smoke have a good time and the beers were good nni had a sandwhich it was pretty good as well

wow this barerrr convenience store is popping on friday nights  i just stopped by for a quick break on a bike ride so i didnt get to thoroughly assess this location   it has a really cool courtyard that is a great place to hang out in the evening  ill have to update my review when i get to see more
i think its time america got rid of walmarts

their cupcakes are incredibly delicious its a pity they have calories despite the rather high price of 325 dollars and above for one cupcake i still give them 4 stars considering that many people are willing to pay 325 dollars or more for a cup of coffee it seems like a fair tradeoff for a special treat

which eatery offers the finest chinese fare in this area considering it is seemingly the solitary choice accessible my suggestion is to use the metro and explore chinatown even though it might be pricey and lacks any remarkable characteristics
the service was on the slower side and the food was only mediocre

how would you describe the quality of the chinese food i tasted today it was absolutely revolting the worst ive ever had in my life the won ton soup was devoid of any flavor with undercooked meat and dumplings that tasted exactly like playdoh i will never eat there again
